title: 81x15: Applicability of 18 U.S.C. § 207 Restrictions
summary: A former government attorney representing domestic gas companies in negotiations with a foreign state-owned oil company would not be restricted by 18 U.S.C. § 207. Also, 18 U.S.C. § 207(b) would not prohibit his representing the companies to the Federal Government because it would be based on a new particular matter with different specific parties.
